data.displayName: Small Business Standing Offer Allgas NSW Network

fees.description: May be charged when payment is not received by the due date indicated on your bill. Incl GST.
May be charged when manually connecting or reading your meter when you move into a property or change retailer. Incl GST.
May be charged when manually reconnecting or reading your meter when you move into a property or change retailer. Incl GST.
May be charged when you request a disconnection of your meter. Incl GST.
May be charged when you request a disconnection of your meter when moving out of the premises. Incl GST.
May be charged when a disconnection is arranged due to non-payment. Incl GST.
May be charged when a direct debit payment is dishonoured. Incl GST.
May be charged when payment is made via direct debit. Incl GST.
May be charged when payment is made via debit or credit card. Incl GST.
May be charged when payment is made via American Express card. Incl GST.

gasContract.terms: Perpetual Energy Standing Offer to Small Business customers in Allgas NSW network.
gasContract.additionalFeeInformation: Additional fees and charges may apply. Please see the fee schedules on our website.
